item.title: Slippery leaves piled up, also blocking drain, 30th October
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Sunningdale Road, Southborough, London

item.title: Poor road surface, causing vibration from HGV and day/night buses, 30th October
item.description:
FixMyStreet ref: 8332824. Noise pollution This had been happening for 3 plus years and is worsening, The road surface has been damaged by the weight of Environ electric busses. When the busses travel over the surface they create a lot of noise and vibration which shakes my entire house. This wakes me up at all hours of the night and early morning. The panels on the busses vibrate as they travel over the indentations in the road, causing additional noise pollution. This situation is unacceptable as I cannot sleep. Also, the vibrations have caused my driveway and front of house to crack.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hook Lane, Blackfen, London
Report on FixMyStreet
